metadata.title: CVE-2018-7753 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bleach 2.1.x before 2.1.3. Attributes that haveURI values weren't properly sanitized if the values contained characterentities. Using character entities, it was possible to construct a URIvalue with a scheme that was not allowed that would slide throughunsanitized.

criterions.comment: python-bleach: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
